p: Results in Table 10 showed the number of coded experimental runs, the results of the experiment carried out, the predicted values by both RSM and ANN and the residual values obtained. It was observed from the Table that the experimental highest biodiesel obtained was 91.00% (w/w) at run 10 with coded values of X 1 = 0, X 2 = +1 and X 3 = −1. However, statistical analysis via RSM predicted 91.65% (w/w) at X 1 = −0.999996, X 2 = −0.999996 and X 3 = −0.999996, while ANN predicted 95.26% (w/w) at variable factors of X 1 = −1.00, X 2 = −1.00 and X 3 = −1.00, respectively.
